titleStmt.title: George J. Beatey et al. to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG2238

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1863-1867

body.p:
Mt Olivet -- Ky
Oct 31st 1865
To his Exlency
Gov Bramlett

We The trustees and Police Judge of Mt Olivet Pray you to Release Geo Bently from the office of Police Judge of Said town By his request; And we also pray you to Appoint Archable Bettys Pollice Judge of said town for the Bal of the unexpired time of Geo Bently, ^Present^ Police, Judge we Remain Your &c

George J Bently Police Judge
James Kenton
Wm Paul
R C. Word } Trustees
A. W. Bettys Clerk

Police Judge
Mt Olivet
Resignation of George Bently & appointment of Archable Bettys
4th Nov 1865
